title: [OFFTOPIC] Are the games I've bought on Steam really mine?
body: I was talking to a colleague about the fact that the skins that I bought on lol are not really mine: if I had to be banned or if the riot would be closed tomorrow I can't expect to get my money back. And from here I asked myself: is the same for Steam games? That is, the same scenario, if steam closed the games I bought tomorrow I could lose them forever and still not have the right to compensation. I know that in the US Steam has added in its contractual terms the fact that you can't do any class action against it: is this thing true? Would it also be in europe? If it is like this I think I will stop buying games on these platforms and return to the old dear cd rom
